title: Juliet no Musume
sinopse:
A beautiful girl with a tragic past. She acts as a "glass doll" to her family's wills. One day, while filming, she meets a guy with a generous smile who understands her. She rebels her family for her own desires. However, the man of her dreams turns out to be a cruel man, willing to hurt the woman he loves to reach success. She takes him on in the treacherous world of business and love. Will they ever come together as one?

(Source: MU)
